Arizona business owners, this year support local commerce by giving your clients holiday gifts from your own community. We can curate just about anything from our amazingly talented local artisans, small batch makers, bakeries and creative small businesses.
Every product, including the box, is from an Arizona business.
We can hand-deliver each gift, work within any budget and we offer discounts on large quantity gift orders.

We’d be happy to put together a few ideas for you. All you have to do is send an us an email letting us know the quantity, budget and a few things about the recipients and we'll take care of the rest.

Monsoon Strategy specializes in marketing strategy, product strategy, customer acquisition & retention, Web efficacy & conversion, information architectures & application interfaces, startup advisory services, and investor deal sourcing & due diligence.Our clients include Amazon.com, Apple, Intel, Paul Allen's Vulcan Group, Hitachi, Cold Stone Creamery, TASER International, ACT!, SalesLogix, AmSafe, Ballroom Dance Channel, Golfsmith, Georgia-Pacific, McKesson Specialty, [a leading medical manufacturing company], Ryver, GreenNurture, Avnet, Jigsaw Health, Ewing Irrigation, Michigan State University, Spring Arbor University, Grand Canyon University, Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University, Phoenix Art Museum, Pulte Homes, Little Gym International, DriveTime, FireHost, Aerisa, Silver State Bank, ClickGreener.com, iMemories, Beneco, V's Barbershop, O-Reilly (Checker/Schuck's/Kragen Auto Parts), and numerous early stage startups.

I'm the co-creator of STEAMTeam 5."STEAMTeam 5: The Beginning" is a children’s book designed to get girls excited about STEAM: Science, Technology, Engineering, Art & Math.  The book tells the story of five amazing girls who use science, technology, engineering, art, and math to do amazing things.But this is much more than just a book. It’s the beginning of a movement to attract girls to careers in STEM/STEAM.  Read our backstory at www.steamteam5.com.

myGoals.com was a subscription-based goal-setting site. We launched at DEMO in 2001. The site has been featured internationally by hundreds of media outlets including CNN, CNNfn, New York Times, Time, Newsweek, USA Today, Wall St. Journal, ABC News, MSNBC, CBS Early Show, NPR, BBC, and Rolling Stone.
Marketing Consulting for the FlipStart miniPC. I was hired to help launch the FlipStart miniPC. My role there enabled me to use a variety of skills, from product marketing to public relations.

My firm consulted to TASER, and Mark was our point of contact and TASER's key person for all online marketing strategy and initiatives. Mark is quite skilled at identifying opportunities for growing revenue, pulling in the appropriate resources, and getting buy-in from internal stakeholders. He did an excellent job managing (and significantly growing) multiple online channels and teams, and it was a real pleasure to work with him. It's rare to find someone who is both technically astute and a seasoned, creative marketer. Plus, he's a lot of fun to work with. I recommend him for any senior/executive-level online marketing position where his passion for building Web businesses can be best put to good use.

summary: Senior product marketer with experience in diverse industries (from enterprise to consumer products) and managing products from cradle to grave. As a product marketer, I co-developed and launched four technology products at IDG/VentureBeat's DEMO conferences. I'm currently a partner at Monsoon Strategy, where our specialties include marketing strategy, product strategy, customer acquisition & retention, Web efficacy & conversion, information architectures & application interfaces, startup advisory services, and investor deal sourcing & due diligence.Specialties: Cradle-to-grave product marketing, strategic marketing, customer acquisition and retention, and competitive analysis. I specialize in developing online marketing plans and have direct experience designing, launching, optimizing, and recruiting key personnel for online channels including strategic and affiliate partnerships, search engine marketing, e-commerce conversion optimization, paid advertising, and social media.
